text: I can't imagine a life without the ocean
growing up beside it. It's very much a
symbol of home.
What a shame it would be, to live your whole
life without ever seeing it?
I teamed up with some friends to bring
three autistic youth to Cozumel
Thirteen
Eight
and Four
To walk through the first airport
fly on the first plane
to feel the sand between thier toes on
their first beach, and splash in the
ocean for the very first time.
I can't remember the last time I smiled so hard.
... and here we go!
Here's the thing about autism we just
don't get. It's not a disease.
It's a different way of interpreting the
colors, shapes, and sounds of the world
around us. It's a misunderstood condition,
one that alienates kids and families.
We don't take the time to understand,
and that's the problem.
Beforehand I didn't really know too much about it,
but I instantly fell in love with these kids.
The smiles, the laughs, and their
different interpretation of our world.
I'm a firm believer that being different
is one of the best things a person can be.
Hey, all we ask is to just take a little bit
of time out of your day learn a tiny bit more
about this subject. Have an open heart,
go say hi. Break down the wall we've built
You'll be amazed what these kids are capable of,
and you'll be amazed how much you don't know.
1 in 150 kids in born with this. Autism is really quite common.
and the biggest thing holding these people back is
our lack of understanding about the condition
Below in the description there are some movies, some links, some things to check out,
to learn a little bit more, and help everybody so much.
This project was incredibly powerful for me, and it couldn't have happened without
my friends here in Mexico
Grupo Presidente as well as Interjet, and the hotel over in Cozumel
The Presidente Intercontinental. They were all great great to work with,
and I'm so happy we could put it together.
As well as my friend Ale Ivanova, and fellow youtuber.
We worked together with the nonprofit Iluminemos de Azul
All these people are awesome, their links are below, please check them out as well.
Thank you! My name is Mike Corey of Kick the Grind. This project was great,
and I'm happy you're involved in it to, just by watching it!
See you next Wednesday on my channel.
Experiences over Possessions
Kick the Grind. And I'll catch you then.
